|lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PCI CardBus Controller;Texas Instruments;PCI1510;PCIbus, PCI1510, 7A82A1F6W, G4;1; ,,, USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;Î¼PD720102GC;NEC JAPAN, D720102GC, 0734E3023;1; |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=LinksysXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Linksys[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:21:29 |oui_eth=00:21:29 }} ''Wireless-G Router for Mobile Broadband''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54G3GV2-ST}} [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt54g3gv2-vf WRT54G3GV2-VF on the OpenWrt wiki] "3763-12140203R REV:XC" is silkscreened on the board. WRT54G3GV2-ST serial numbers appear to start with '''CSC0'''. The device uses a '''NEC''' D720102GC USB 2.0 controller chip and a '''Texas Instruments''' PCI1510 CardBus controller chip. The default SSID is '''LinksysXXXX''' where '''XXXX''' is the last two octets of the wireless interface MAC (upper case letters). ==Images== File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST angled.jpg|angled File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST bottom.jpg|bottom / label side File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST top side.jpg|top side File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST front side.jpg|front side File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST back side.jpg|back side File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST power adapter.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST board top.jpg|board top File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST board top shield removed.jpg|board top, shield removed File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST Flash.jpg|Flash File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST front RAM.jpg|front RAM chip File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST TI PCI1510.jpg|TI CardBus controller File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST NEC D720102GC.jpg|NEC USB 2.0 controller File:Linksys WRT54G3GV2-ST back RAM.jpg|back RAM chip [[Has images::internal| ]]
